title: PLS TELL ME WHAT JUST HAPPENED (ACCOUNT ISSUES)
body:
I just logged in and found out that I was in a game.
as soon as I joined the game I saw that I was playing as darius and I was level 4 (the rest of the players were around level 11)
CAN I SEE MY LOG IP HISTORY OR STH?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Whoa, that's definitely not good! I strongly recommend securing your account with the steps outlined in [this article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) You can't get an IP login history, but if you notice anything missing or off about your account, definitely reach out to our accounts team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
